data.text: Yahweh, ◄why are you far away from us?/it seems that you are far away from us.► [RHQ]
People who are proud gladly cause poor people to suffer.
They brag about the evil things that they want to do.
But it seems that they succeed in everything that they do.
They think, “Nothing bad will happen to us!
When they talk [MTY], they are always cursing, lying, and threatening to harm others.
They hide in villages, ready to ◄ambush/suddenly attack► and kill people who ◄are innocent/have done nothing wrong►.
They are like [MET] lions that crouch down and hide,
Just like helpless animals are crushed,
Wicked people say, “God will not pay any attention to what we do.
Yahweh God, arise and help us
But you see the trouble and the distress that they cause.
◄Break the arms/Destroy the power► of wicked [DOU] people!
Yahweh, you are our king forever,
You have listened to afflicted/suffering people when they cry out to you.
You show that orphans and oppressed people have not done things that are wrong,
